content:
Netizen submissions
On November 26, under a video showing the arrest of Du Yuming, a Kuomintang general during the Huaihai Campaign, netizens expressed their respect for him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, due to the recent arrival of the Central Environmental Protection Supervision Group in Fuzhou, the Fuzhou Traffic Police Department has been on the streets to catch motorcycles in large numbers. Even if they have a green license plate, they will be confiscated if they are found.
This has caused dissatisfaction among drivers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 24, Sanhe City, Hebei Province
Due to the recent rampant outbreak of mycoplasma pneumonia and other influenza diseases, the Sanhe City Emergency Rescue Center organized personnel to enter the campus wearing large white protective clothing to carry out disinfection work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Real-life version of "Blind Mountain"
On October 25, a netizen posted that he witnessed the process of bride kidnapping during the Miao New Year in a village in Rongjiang, Guizhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/G7HEgk1s1A

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a little girl from Guangxi released a video saying that her father was electrocuted while working in the factory on August 27. The family did not know until after her father's death.
From July 14 to August 27, when her father entered the factory, he worked 15 hours of night shift every day without a day off. And the factory kicked her father out of all work groups afterwards.
As of the time of posting, the dispute has not been resolved, and the factory only paid funeral expenses. Now the burden of the family falls on the mother and two children. Usually, the 5-year-old Xiaoyan and her 5-year-old brother help her mother share some housework and take care of her 1-year-old brother.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 24, Yingkou Bayuquan, Liaoning. Due to the recent outbreak of mycoplasma pneumonia and other influenza, half of the students in a local primary school classroom were missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 26, Wenzhou City.
A little girl suddenly fell to the ground and convulsed due to a high fever. Fortunately, the girl was in the hospital at the time of the incident, and the doctors around her immediately rescued the little girl.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 26, the 2024 public subject written examination for the central government and its directly affiliated institutions will officially begin.
According to the State Administration of Civil Service of China, a total of 3.033 million people have passed the qualification review of employers, and the ratio of the number of people who have passed the qualification review to the number of recruitment plans is about 77:1. According to statistics from relevant agencies, as of the end of registration, the application-to-recruitment ratio of the top ten positions with high competition was over 1700:1, and the application-to-recruitment ratio of the hottest position reached 3572:1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 25, Suzhou, Jiangsu.
A netizen posted a video saying that a woman wearing a red vest and claiming to be from China Unicom Community Business Hall came to sell 5G phone cards. After being rejected, she first used her body to block the door to prevent the owner from closing the door, and asked "Why don't you want it?"
After the owner forcibly closed the door, the staff member kicked the door of his house several times.
As of the time of posting, the netizen said that he had called the police and complained to China Unicom, but China Unicom has not responded yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Later, netizens said that many media have interviewed, and the local police and Women's Federation promised that they are investigating.
Xiaohongshu posts are not deleted by themselves.
Finally, she said: "Human society is advancing by overthrowing old habits one after another. We will not walk out of the cave now if we always stick to the so-called customs... We are all brave girls."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Qilu Evening News published an article saying that the "bride-robbing" incident was untrue and the two parties were engaged lovers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At 17:00 in the afternoon, the reporter of Qilu Evening News and Qilu One Point contacted Pan, the woman who was "robbed" online, through the contact information provided by the staff of Xinghua Police Station in Rongjiang County.
Pan was angry about the online content and said: "She misunderstood me. She did not ask us before posting these, and she did not understand the customs and habits here."
Pan said that she and the man were voluntarily married, and denied the post that Pan had sent a mobile phone message to ask relatives and friends for help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The blogger released a video describing his experience at the time

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Full-process democracy"
Under a video about "People's Congress representatives"
Sixty thousand netizens collectively declared:
I have never authorized or voted for others to represent me
I have never authorized or entrusted anyone to participate in any form of voting on my behalf

Today the snack bar sign "I'm waiting for you on Urumqi Middle Road" was covered

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the rumor was refuted by Qilu Evening News, the blogger was cyberbullied and then released a video in response, pointing out that the woman reported in Qilu Evening News and the woman he filmed were not the same person, and their hair colors were different.
At the same time, the recording of last night was released. Local villagers said that robbing brides was a custom, and their brother's wife was robbed. After the woman called the police, the brother only stayed in the police station for two hours, and said that there are fewer robbed brides now, and there were more robbed brides in the past.
The incident took place in Baibei Village, Xinghua Township, Rongjiang County, Qiandongnan Prefecture, Guizhou Province.
